meanings.definition: Jouals (noun): a type of footwear worn by sailors
meanings.sent1: The sailor put on his sturdy jouals before heading out to sea.
meanings.sent2: The jouals protected the sailor's feet from the rough deck of the ship.
meanings.sent3: As the sailor danced on the deck, his jouals tapped out a merry rhythm.
meanings.sent4: The jouals were like loyal companions, never leaving the sailor's side.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out jouals told the story of countless adventures at sea.

meanings.definition: Jouals (verb): to speak or communicate in a loud, boastful manner
meanings.sent1: He would jouals about his accomplishments to anyone who would listen.
meanings.sent2: The politician jouals during his speeches to impress the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The parrot jouals loudly, mimicking the sounds it hears around.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter jouals through the room, infectious and joyful.
meanings.sent5: The thunder jouals in the distance, announcing the coming storm.
